name: The Pizza Freak
description:
It's your first day working as a pizza delivery man. Suddenly one late night something strange happens at one of your deliveries. 

This is my first ever horror game. It's best played in the dark and with headphones on.

 It should take you around 8 - 15 minutes to complete. You can change the settings in the menu

Controls

WASD to move, 

  Mouse to look,

 E to use interact,

Shift to Run

Requirements:

Mode: Single player video game

Genres: Horror

Platforms: Microsoft Windows

Studio: OnoGames

Developer: Yves Weinhardt
